name: Deadly Shield
description: You are skilled in the art of launching a devastating strike from a defensive stance, catching your opponent off guard.

abilities.name: Deadly Shield
abilities.description: Put the hero dice here until the end of the round. While it is there, this hero can immediately take a single weapon action of your choice if they make a save roll of 6 or more against a Combat Attack.

additionalEffect: they can take a weapon action of your choice on a save roll of 5 or more instead.
